item.title: [PI] How do i change an Objects name in Objectdef?

item.description:
@bigger_spec wrote:

Hey guys, i have been searching everywhere on how to change the name of an object.

I have already changed the options for the object when clicked, but i need help on how to change the name of the object and the examine, if you guys know the code, could you please help, many thanks.

This is the code that i already have.

} if (i == 5842) { objectDef.itemActions[0] = "Mine"; objectDef.itemActions[2] = "Prospect"; objectDef.hasActions = true; }
